alert.note: Alert for Gray; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 6:57PM CDT until May 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WHEELER AND NORTHEASTERN GRAY COUNTIES... At 656 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Codman, or 9 miles south of Miami, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 650 PM CDT, trained spotters reported hail between the size of ping pong balls and golf balls 6 miles south of Miami. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Wheeler and northeastern Gray Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
